trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Marshall
There were no other sightings in Marshall on or around August 5th 2013
Summary: star like object observed traveling south of Marshall, Tx fm rd 1186
divs: Sighting DetailsA bright star like object was observed by several of us in the immediate area traveling from the west to the east towards the Louisiana border from south of Marshall, Tx. Looking at the object, the white light was the brightest in the center of it....and the object had to have had at least 8 or 10 sides on it because of the way the light in the center glowed around the perimeter. There was no sound coming from the object.
